report.title: UKBMS Occurrence list for a CMS user
report.description: An occurrence list with a count attribute to be used in the UKBMS Annual Summary table, with filters for CMS user (mandatory), date start and end, location.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM occurrences o JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN samples parent ON parent.id=s.parent_id AND parent.deleted = FALSE JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttlpref ON ttlpref.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlpref.preferred='t' AND ttlpref.deleted=false JOIN taxa tpref ON tpref.id=ttlpref.taxon_id AND tpref.deleted=false JOIN (sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.id=sav.sample_attribute_id AND sa.deleted=false AND sa.caption='CMS User ID' ) ON sav.sample_id=parent.id AND sav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE o.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(sav.int_value AS character varying)='#user_id#' OR '#user_id#' = '') AND (CAST(parent.location_id AS character varying)='#location_id#' OR '#location_id#'='') #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, s.id as sample_id, parent.location_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, ttl.id as taxa_taxon_list_id, tpref.taxon

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the CMS user

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location
